item.title: Rocksmith¬Æ 2014 Edition REMASTERED LEARN & PLAY
item.description:
Title: Rocksmith¬Æ 2014 Edition REMASTERED LEARN & PLAY
Genre: Casual , Simulation
Developer: Ubisoft - San Francisco , Ubisoft - Osaka
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release Date: Dec 19, 2024




About This Game

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered is back by popular demand! Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, it's a fantastic way to learn guitar or bass at your own pace, now available in an all-new 2024 edition. Get ready to rock (again)!

In 2023, Rocksmith 2014 Remastered was temporarily removed due to the expiration of our music licensing deals. While we believe Rocksmith+ offers the ultimate destination for learning guitar, bass and piano with its extensive music catalog, we have also heard the Rocksmith 2014 community‚Äôs feedback. You asked for Rocksmith 2014 Remastered to return, so we did just that! We have been hard at work to deliver a special version giving you the choice to own your songs and enjoy popular features like Guitarcade and Session Mode.

Introducing Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition!

WHAT'S NEW IN THIS EDITION?

While Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play retains all the core features you love, we‚Äôve replaced all licensed songs with a collection of tracks and exercises from our popular downloadable content bundles. This includes:

‚Ä¢ Bachsmith and Bachsmith II

‚Ä¢ Classic Melody Song Pack

‚Ä¢ Rocksmith Easy Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

‚Ä¢ Rocksmith Intermediate Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

‚Ä¢ Rocksmith Advanced Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

These bundles cover a wide range of techniques and musical styles to help you develop your skills and learn new ones.

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition is identical to the original in all other aspects. You can still easily learn songs thanks to the 3D Noteway, enjoy Multiplayer with friends, or refine your skills with Riff Repeater. Best of all, the downloadable songs from the original Rocksmith 2014 Remastered are fully compatible with Learn & Play Edition, allowing you to easily create your own personalized song library. Our home-made official content is carefully craftedto sound and play like a fined tuned guitar, so if you want to find the best song versions, you know where to come!

LEARN & PLAY YOUR FAVORITE SONGS

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition is a great and fun way to learn and play real music, focusing on the songs you love. Whether you're picking up your first guitar or aiming to perfect advanced techniques, the game adapts to your skill level and offers comprehensive practice tools and options, ensuring you progress quickly, no matter where you start.

Join millions of players who have already mastered guitar using Rocksmith's award-winning method. Using a Real Tone Cable, simply plug any real guitar or bass into your PC to start your musical journey today!!

IMPORTANT NOTES

‚Ä¢ If you already own Rocksmith 2014 Remastered on Steam, please be aware that you won‚Äôt be able to download the Learn & Play edition to avoid losing your original base game‚Äôs licensed music.

‚Ä¢ We are aware of an issue preventing new users from creating a Uplay account with the current password requirements. The correct password guidelines are:

o 8 to 16 characters

o At least 1 lowercase letter

o At least 1 uppercase letter

o At least 1 number

o At least 1 special character

o Passwords must not contain your username

Please note that additional downloadable songs cannot be purchased directly via the in-game store interface and need to be purchased directly via the Steam store instead. Once purchased, those additional downloadable songs will be added to the game's song list automatically.

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 8
    • Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or 2.8 GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 9 / NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ 8600 GT or ATI Radeon‚Ñ¢ HD 2600 XT
    • Hard Drive: 12 GB HD space
    • Sound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
      Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 8
    • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i3-540 or 3.3 GHz Athlon II X3 455
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 512MB Nvidia GT 240 or 512 MB ATI Radeon HD 5670
    • Hard Drive: 12 GB HD space
    • Sound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
      Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS

item.title: Taiwan Love Story‚Åµ
item.description:
Title: Taiwan Love Story‚Åµ
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Âø´Ê®ÇÊÄ™Áâ© , Á¥≥Â£´ÂêâÂ®É , MakerË£ΩÈÄ†Ê©ü
Publisher: LewdLoco , Mango Party , Mango Party News
Franchise: LewdLoco , Mango Party
Release Date: Dec 18, 2024




About This Game

üíóTaiwan Love Story ‚Åµüíó

The Story

You're a college senior studying humanities at a university, and during a camping event held by your department, you meet five women from different parts of Taiwan. While you're hanging around the bonfire, a mysterious kiss leaves you lovestruck and yearning for more. Inspiration strikes, and you finally settle on a thesis topic: "The Binary Equation of Love and Happiness."

In order to both finish your thesis and find true love, you set out on an adventure around the island. Along the way, you meet up with the women and experience a series of bittersweet romantic encounters bursting with youthful naivety. Your very own Taiwanese love story is about to begin...





Features

  • Light, fun simulation gameplay
  • Well-crafted, rich storylines for all 5 women
  • Exciting mini-games that match the game's theme
  • Full voice acting for the women!
  • Deep insights into local Taiwanese life and culture
  • Fully dynamic, immersive CGs
  • Download the free DLCs to unlock even more content!

Characters




Amy Lin
A female professional who's traveled to the big city for work. She's an absent-minded and somewhat clumsy white-collar employee. Though she appears innocent and sweet, deep down she has a rather stubborn side.



Amanda Zhang
An aristocratic bookworm from Kaohsiung who's quiet and reserved, having been brought up in a strict household. She loves singing, but her father's plan has no room for art, so she has to give up on her dream...



Zoe Hai
A lively, exuberant girl from Penghu. She loves diving and seems to have endless energy. Ain't nobody don't love Zoe!



Lil' Blu
A hot betel nut babe from Taichung who acts like she won't let anyone get close. She's got a strong personality and is tough as shit, but deep down, she's just a girl who longs for affection.



Sarah Wang
The co-owner of a small eel noodle shop in Tainan with her husband. Mrs. Wang is the essence of maternal warmth, and is a caring, captivating milf.

item.title: Idle Colony
item.description:
Title: Idle Colony
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Faith G.
Publisher: Faith G.
Release Date: Dec 16, 2024




About This Game

Idle Colony is a game about little creatures and big numbers that will make your dopamine go up and your worries go down.

Merge

Combine two fruits of the same tier into the next one. 1$, 2$, 4$, 8$... This process generates an exponential amount of money as you make your way up to bigger fruits.

Upgrade

Unlock buildings to uncover always more options to leverage your income. As cash comes in, it goes out, to come back even faster! Improve every aspect of your economy to make the best out of it.

Automate

You will start with a sapling that you'll have to manually water and harvest, but soon enough you'll be able to recruit thousands of na√Øve creatures to assist you in your endeavor. They collect, fertilize, chop down, plant trees, create machines... and they love it!

Prestige

Now that you've got a wok full of delicious fruits and an army of colonists dedicated to you, it is time to perform the ritual... Sacrifice your colony to access powerful technologies and go even further next time!

Synergize

Through your progress, you'll earn two unique currencies to spend with care. Find the best strategies by carefully picking your technologies and special upgrades. Your choices will make the difference between millions and quintillions.

A word of the author:

I've been crafting games for a couple years, pursuing my childhood dream of making a living by creating fun things. I'm doing everything in my games: music, engine, art... and I love to talk with you all to improve my work through your feedback.

You're welcome anytime to have a chat on Discord (link on the right panel).

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Processor: AMD 3600x
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1060 GTX
    • Storage: 100 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Processor: AMD 5700x
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 2070 RTX
    • Storage: 100 MB available space

item.title: KLETKA
item.description:
Title: KLETKA
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Callback , ln404
Publisher: Callback , ln404
Release Date: Dec 13, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 13, 2024




About This Game

The most dangerous criminals are convicted and sent to Kletka. Your sentence is to descend into the depths of the Gigastructure while maintaining a living and hungry elevator. Never forget to feed it if you don't want to end up being eaten alive. Kletka is omnivorous, be ready to feed it both fuel and flesh.

The Gigastructure is an endlessly expanding building. Traps and anomalies fill the corridors. Any stop you make could be your last.

Samosbor is a mysterious anomaly that kills anything in its path. This terrifying phenomenon is feared by all inhabitants as no one has ever survived it. When you hear the siren than it's time to drop everything and run to the elevator as fast as you can. Kletka is the only thing that can protect you from this anomaly.

Form a team of up to six people and descend in the elevator. Friends tend to survive when they work together, but friends also make for good fuel.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains the occasional appearance of blood and human body parts, acts of murder.



System Requirements

Windows

Linux

item.title: Pantheon: Rise of the Fallen
item.description:
Title: Pantheon: Rise of the Fallen
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Visionary Realms
Publisher: Visionary Realms
Release Date: Dec 13, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 13, 2024




About This Game

PANTHEON: RISE OF THE FALLEN IS A DEEPLY SOCIAL HIGH FANTASY MMO
GAME THAT CHALLENGES ITS PLAYERS AND REWARDS EFFORT.

It has been 500 years since the Deicide War severed the connection between the people and their gods. The Ravaging Lord pushed nations across Terminus to near extinction before the Dragon King himself appeared and brought an end to the bloodshed.

Now, the denizens of Terminus must uncover the mysteries of their past and unlock the silenced power of their gods. For war will come again. And this time the dragons won‚Äôt be there to save you.

Explore a Vast Open World

Journey across three continents in a seamless, open world where anything seen can be reached. Discover hidden paths, secret encounters, and rare treasures in a world without boundaries.

Climbing

Climb nearly any surface and seek adventure in every direction, unearthing secrets both above and below.

Perception

Discover clues, dialogues, and outcomes that change based on your adventures and the choices you‚Äôve made along the way. Hone your intuition to see the world in ways others cannot and unravel the mystery with the Perception System.

Unique Skills

From teleportation to conjuring rafts and bridges, there are a myriad of ways to traverse Terminus. What else will you discover in your adventures, and what other paths will reveal themselves when you do?

Climates

Six brutal climates await intrepid adventurers in the far reaches of Terminus. Equip your character to acclimate against them as you ascend windswept peaks, dive to crushing depths, and explore the diverse and dangerous biomes of Terminus.

Fractures

Supernatural forces take root where the veil between worlds thins. Discover specialized artifacts to meet the challenges posed by these unique environments and drive back the invasive powers within.

Day/Night

Hidden things stir when the curtain of night falls on Terminus. Revisit old haunts and previously conquered corners of the world to uncover secrets that only emerge in darkness.

Choose from 9 distinct races and 14 compelling classes to create your character. Brave the dangers of Terminus to grow in power and lend your unique talents to battle, or use your class‚Äôs specialized skills to augment others, alter the environment, or provide valuable services to fellow adventurers.

Unlock Your Potential

Achieve greater power through the Mastery System. Invest the experience you‚Äôve gained to enhance your skills and attributes, growing your character to fit your preferred playstyle.

Fortify Your Legacy

Deeds on Terminus reverberate through a complex web of interconnected factions. Grow your legend as a champion of your people or turn against them to curry favor with your foes, wielding your reputation to unlock new opportunities in the endless land.

Stand Your Ground

Go toe-to-toe against a menagerie of monsters in challenging combat where strategy, knowledge, and teamwork make the difference between victory and defeat. Aid your allies in one of four distinct roles: Tank, Healer, Damage, or Support, and choose from a wide variety of class skills to create your custom loadout.

It‚Äôs dangerous to go alone. Form adventuring parties and guilds with friends, old and new, and overcome greater challenges for even greater rewards. The best experiences are those that are shared.

Dispositions & Traits

The denizens of Terminus are myriad and varied, capable of spawning with a multitube of different behaviors which alter their behaviors and strategies in combat ensuring that no two adventures are ever alike.

Enemy Awareness

Perceiving their surroundings and opponents, enemies choose their actions and tactics based on the circumstances at hand. Adjust your strategy to fend off coordinated assaults and disrupt your enemies‚Äô plans.

Limited Action Set

Choose the right tools for the job, preparing a limited number of skills to bring into battle. Keep aware of your surroundings and be ready to overcome unplanned obstacles.

Build Your Arsenal

Acquire powerful and iconic equipment and rare abilities that boast of the places you‚Äôve been and the battles you‚Äôve won, empowering your character with enhanced attributes and unique effects. Choose wisely from the start and your gear will serve you for many adventures.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6850 3.0GHz / Phenom II X2 555 Black Edition or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 5600 XT
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
